name: James EVERETT, III, pro se Cutis [sic], Petitioner v. Hon. Steven R. GEROFF, Phila. County; Supt. Jerome Walsh, SCI-Dallas; Mrs. Kathleen Kane, Atty. Gen. Penna.; Mr. Seth Williams, D.A. Phila County, Respondents

parties: James EVERETT, III, pro se Cutis [sic], Petitioner v. Hon. Steven R. GEROFF, Phila. County; Supt. Jerome Walsh, SCI-Dallas; Mrs. Kathleen Kane, Atty. Gen. Penna.; Mr. Seth Williams, D.A. Phila County, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
115 A.3d 876
James EVERETT, III, pro se Cutis [sic], Petitioner v. Hon. Steven R. GEROFF, Phila. County; Supt. Jerome Walsh, SCI-Dallas; Mrs. Kathleen Kane, Atty. Gen. Penna.; Mr. Seth Williams, D.A. Phila County, Respondents.
No. 32 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 29, 2015.
